2 ^ Exáŭdi, Deus, deprecațiónem meam~: 3 ^ A fínibus terraĕ ad te clamávi~
intènde orațióni meaĕ. ^ Hear, O God, m: dum anxiarétur cor meum, in pètra exaltavìsti me. ^ To thee have I cried from the ends of the earth~
when my heart was in anguish, thou hast exalted me on a rock.

2 ^ Exáŭdi, Deus, deprecațiónem meam~: 4 ^ Deduxìsti me, qụia factus es spes mea~
intènde orațióni meaĕ. ^ Hear, O God, m: turris fortitúdinis a fáçie inimíci. ^ Thou hast conducted me, for thou hast been my hope~
a tower of strength against the face of the enemy.

2 ^ Exáŭdi, Deus, deprecațiónem meam~: 5 ^ Inhabitábo in tabernáculo tuo in sáĕcula~
intènde orațióni meaĕ. ^ Hear, O God, m: próteģar in velamènto alárum tuárum. ^ In thy tabernacle I shall dwell for ever~
I shall be protected under the covert of thy wings.

2 ^ Exáŭdi, Deus, deprecațiónem meam~: 6 ^ Qụóniam tu, Deus meus, exaŭdivìsti orațiónem meam~
intènde orațióni meaĕ. ^ Hear, O God, m: dedìsti hereditátem timèntibus nomen tuum. ^ For thou, my God, hast heard my prayer~
thou hast given an inheritance to them that fear thy name.

intènde orațióni meaĕ. ^ Hear, O God, m: annos ejus usqụe in diem ģenerațiónis et ģenerațiónis. ^ Thou wilt add days to the days of the king~
his years even to generation and generation.

2 ^ Exáŭdi, Deus, deprecațiónem meam~: 8 ^ Pèrmanet in aĕtèrnum in conspèctu Dei~
intènde orațióni meaĕ. ^ Hear, O God, m: ¿~misericórdiam et veritátem ejus qụìs reqụíret~? ^ He abideth for ever in the sight of God~
his mercy and truth who shall search~?

2 ^ Exáŭdi, Deus, deprecațiónem meam~: 9 ^ sic psalmum dicem nómini tuo in sáĕculum sáĕculi, ut reddam vota mea de die in diem. ^ So will I sing a psalm to thy name for ever and ever, that I may pay my vows from day to day.
